page.title: 10A WEEKEND IN MY LIFE
page.content: trying to do my grade two pieces.My parents go{shopping}while I am having my piano lesson.When my piano lesson is over we all go to Bromyard to do more shopping and go to the library.We then go home and after dinner I call for my friend Elaine and we play until teatime.After tea I watch television until I go to bed. {Sunday:}I get up about 9.00 and have toast for breakfast.I am then told to tidy my room as it is a mess and when I have done that I do other odd jobs or watch television until lunch.After lunch I play with Elaine again until teatime.After tea I wash my hair and have a bath before getting dressed in my night clothes.I watch television until bedtime and then I read in bed until I fall asleep.
